CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Emerald Diner relative to The Golden Spoon?
SRP.A: Emerald Diner is {above} The Golden Spoon in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing The Golden Spoon relative to Crimson Plate?
SRP.A: The Golden Spoon is {below} Crimson Plate in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing The Rusty Kettle relative to Emerald Diner?
SRP.A: The Rusty Kettle is {above} Emerald Diner in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total food cost percentage?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Crimson Plate}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total food cost percentage?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {The Golden Spoon}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Stellar Bistro's minimum Food Cost Percentage in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Stellar Bistro's minimum Food Cost Percentage is in {2001}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is The Rusty Kettle's maximum Food Cost Percentage in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: The Rusty Kettle's maximum Food Cost Percentage is in {2001}.

NC.Q: Between 1977 and 1997, was the average total Food Cost Percentage higher or lower than between 1982 and 1999?
NC.A: The average total food cost percentage between 1977 and 1997 was {lower} than between 1982 and 1999.

NC.Q: Between 1987 and 1997, did the total Food Cost Percentage experience a larger or smaller change than between 1984 and 1993?
NC.A: The change in total food cost percentage between 1987 and 1997 was {larger} than between 1984 and 1993.

NC.Q: Was the total Food Cost Percentage in 1997 higher or lower than in 1998?
NC.A: The total food cost percentage in 1997 was {lower} than in 1998.

NC.Q: Was the total Food Cost Percentage in 1975 higher or lower than in 1992?
NC.A: The total food cost percentage in 1975 was {lower} than in 1992.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Crimson Plate} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Stellar Bistro and The Golden Spoon first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Stellar Bistro and The Golden Spoon first exchanged leading positions in {1973}.
